nodes.text: Rayar was an Ithorian male and member of the Car'das intelligence ring during the Galactic Civil War. During the Battle of Tansarii Point Station between Car'das and Black Sun forces, Laetin A'shera's pilots eliminated a Black Sun spy during a patrol mission in the Lucent Ivaya quadrant of the Bright Jewel system. Information found on the spy was quickly transmitted to Agent Rayar.
